name: Lordaeron, Sacrosanct
description: Artist: Lordaeron Title: Sacrosanct Cat No: UBR010CD Free worldwide shipping on all CDs during January 2011! A devastating slab of brutally intricate Death Metal from the UK's finest. OUT NOW!!! 'They perform their ferocious blend of Death and Black Metal flawlessly.' - Terrorizer magazine 'Lordaeron are about as brutal as you can get!!!' - planet-loud.com For fans of: Cannibal Corpse, Death, Nile, Decapitated, Necrophagist, Bloodbath, Behemoth, etc. 1. Celestial Desolation 2. Wolf In Hiding 3. Obligatory Suffering 4. Homage To The Hermit 5. Eye Of Sargeras 6. Forward The Legion 7. Swansong For The Detritus 8. Of Fear And Flame 9. Feeding The Flies 10. Doomsayer (The Curse Of Frostmourne)

name: Serotonal, Monumental
description: Artist: Serotonal Title: Monumental Cat No: UBR009CD Free worldwide shipping on all CDs during January 2011! Formed in 2004, Serotonal herald the return of the most recognisable voice in Metal - the legend that is Darren White, the original singer with Anathema. The band have spent the intervening years honing their sound and touring, including outstanding festival performances across Europe and at Bloodstock 2008 in the UK. 'Monumental - songs of misery and hope' is a collection of the most heart-wrenching and evocative Metal you will ever hear. Infectious grooves and crushing riffs make for an onslaught that will appeal to fans across the many sub-genres of Metal. Limited edition initial pressing includes high quality slipcase. "The most welcome return of the year... A splendid piece of doom-infused Metal, drenched in moody atmosphere" 8/10 Terrorizer "Quite simply, this is as essential as any album!!!" 9/10 UKMetalUnderground 01. Self Control Seizure [4:07] 02. Now It's Over [3:49] 03. Unseen [4:42] 04. Wasteland [4:01] 05. Chaosmind [3:56] 06. Monumental [8:05] 07. Hinge () [3:12] 08. Isolated [6:40] 09. Natureality [3:49]

name: Steel Tormentor, Return Of A King
description: Artist: Steel Tormentor Title: Return Of A King Free worldwide shipping on all CDs during January 2011! Steel Tormentor return with their strongest recording to date! A tour-de-force of traditional Heavy Metal that will course through the veins of any hard music lover! www.powermetal.de 9/10 www.metal-integral.com 17/20 www.musikreviews.de 12/15 www.truemetal.it 81/100 www.metalcdratings.com 4/5 For fans of: Iron Maiden, Judas Priest, Helloween, Saxon, NWOBHM, Motorhead, Black Sabbath, Grand Magus. 01. Ghost of Avalon 02. Evil coming 03. Armageddon 04. Warrior 05. Soul stealer 06. Into the black 07. Return of a King 08. Warrior (single edit)

name: Insidious, Digital Disdain
description: Artist: INSIDIOUS Title: Digital Disdain Cat No: UBR005CD Free worldwide shipping on all CDs during January 2011! Jaw-dropping technical Death Metal with a modern edge! "True tech-death metal style... something very special..." - Zero Tolerance (3.5/5) "Impressive... The tech metal boys close ranks and marvel... Imagine Bolt Thrower sped up and crossed with Cynic playing Fear Factory covers" - Terrorizer (6.5/10) "Insidious create the kind of noise that tries to prise your brain free of your skull... Demands your attention throughout... Kind of like Sunn O))) being attacked by a computer" - Kerrang! (KKK) "an evolved human race is born - Insidious" - Metal Hammer Italy (8/10) 1. Intro. 2. Charges Of Disgust 3. Eradication 4. Blood Harvest 5. Subservience 6. Digital Disdain 7. Slave to the System

name: Soul Destruction, There's No Profit...
description: Artist: Soul Destruction Title: There's No Profit In Truth Cat No: UBR006CD Free worldwide shipping on all CDs during January 2011! Immense new album from the UK’s most hard-hitting, vibrant, engaging and relevant band! Mastered by none other than Tim Turan (At the Gates, Opeth, Marilyn Manson). "The real deal…Audacious songwriting… Intelligent Alt-Metal" – Kerrang! "The range of Soul Destruction's music is huge, but it's all held together with a convincing delivery and the knowledge that this is a band that will always put their all into everything they do" – live4metal.com 1. A New Religion 2. Spiral Of Violence 3. A Little Less of Someone Else? 4. This Disease 5. Internal Therapy 6. Modern Day Freakshow 7. Educate 8. Dysfunctional Reality 9. The Sorrow
